item.description: On its third year, this festival has now become an Advent tradition! Join some of the best musicians from Boston College and the St Ignatius parish community for this spiritual and aesthetic experience. Readings from the Christmas story and carols alternate in Spanish, Portuguese, French, Italian and Latin. Carols and instrumental pieces from plainchant and 17th and 18th century European sources, including favourites such as “Riu Riu Chiu” and “Veni, veni Emanuel,” and a chance for everyone to sing along in your preferred language to “Silent Night”. Presented in collaboration with the St.Ignatius Music Ministry, Boston College Department of Romance Languages and Literatures, Boston College Office of Residential Life, and the Maison francaise and Casa hispanica at Boston College. There will be a reception following the concert.

group.name: The Boston Euro Social Meetup Group

item.name: Christmas stories and carols in 5 European Latin languages
